lean.Name: Lean
lean.Hint: Press to move your vision towards the mouse cursor.

limit.Name: Maximum Lean Distance
limit.Hint: How many spaces a token can lean.

canLeanInCombat.Name: Combat Only
canLeanInCombat.Hint: Players can only lean during encounters.

combatLeanToggle.Name: Scene Controls Button
combatLeanToggle.Hint: Adds a button to the scene controls to toggle the Combat Only setting.

notifyOnLean.Name: Notify When Leaning
notifyOnLean.Hint: Players will send a whisper to the GM when they lean.

notifySound.Name: Notification Sound
notifySound.Hint: Play a sound when a notification message is sent. Leave it empty to disable it.
